data.eml:eml: The Little Lichen Dragon—an extraordinary katydid from the Ecuadorian Andes (Orthoptera, Tettigoniidae, Phaneropterinae, Dysoniini)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Braun, Holger (2011): The Little Lichen Dragon—an extraordinary katydid from the Ecuadorian Andes (Orthoptera, Tettigoniidae, Phaneropterinae, Dysoniini). Zootaxa 3032: 33-39, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.204924
